archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Resource Provisioning Activity
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process escalates resource orders in accordance with local policy, adds information to an existing resource order, modifies information in an existing resource order, cancels a resource order when the initiating service order is cancelled, and also modifies the resource order status, including setting it to complete when the resource order has been fulfilled.

properties.value: Not used for this process element
